entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:43 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 10:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -13.5°C
Wind: N 20 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 20 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
